title: bedtime
message: Hello, mic testing 123. Um... I'm very tired, I'm just gonna go to bed. This is the- thing I do before I go. There we go. Now I gotta press the button Q, then I'm good to go to bed.
summary:
- The speaker is doing a mic test.
- The speaker is tired and going to bed.
- The speaker mentions pressing the button Q before going to bed.
- The speaker is preparing to end their activities for the day and go to sleep.
